original: @68b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @68b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya kha garbha aashto tta ra sha ta ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
analyzed: a'arya kha garbha aashto tta ra sha ta ka n'a ma dh'a ra n'i mantra sa hi ta /
translated: Arya-Akashgarbha-ashtottara-shatanama-dharani-sahita

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa /
translated: The Noble One Hundred and Eight Names of Akashagarbha with Dhāraṇī and Mantra

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyis 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyis 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble One, Akashagarbha, with a vast face and eyes radiating light, illuminating the fragrant center of space.

original: nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i @69a *//
analyzed: nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i @69a *//
translated: Homage to the one whose domain is space,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: illuminating all the maṇḍalas of the earth.

original: aom svasti ka m'a lakshi bi pu la sambha ba /
analyzed: aom svasti ka m'a lakshi bi pu la sambha ba /
translated: Oṃ svasti-kāmala-kṣi-vipulāmbha-

original: dharma dh'u tu go tsa ra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: dharma dh'u tu go tsa ra sv'a h'a /
translated: dharmadhātu-gocara svāhā.

original: gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni //
analyzed: gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni //
translated: As soon as this dhāraṇī is recited, all the lower realms and unfortunate destinies

original: rab tu zhi bar gyur /
analyzed: rab tu zhi bar gyur /
translated: are completely pacified.

original: sa yang g-yos par gyur /
analyzed: sa yang g-yos par gyur /
translated: The earth shakes,

original: rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur /
analyzed: rnga bo che dag gi sgra yang grags par gyur /
translated: and the sound of great drums is heard.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: All the buddhas also say, ‘Excellent!’”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One Vairocana said,

original: kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi sv'a h'a'i mchog gi gzungs //
analyzed: kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi sv'a h'a'i mchog gi gzungs //
translated: “Oh, you beings gathered in the maṇḍala, listen to this supreme dhāraṇī of Akṣobhya, the heart of all the tathāgatas,

original: 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba; bsod nams chen po /
analyzed: 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba; bsod nams chen po /
translated: which is very difficult to obtain, has great merit,

original: sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa /
analyzed: sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa /
translated: burns all evil and afflictions,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma /
translated: and is the mother of all bodhisattvas,

original: rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: this heap of jewels. By hearing it, one becomes stainless, well-washed, and very pure.

original: padma lta bur 'gyur te; 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so //
analyzed: padma lta bur 'gyur te; 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so //
translated: One becomes like a lotus, unstained by the mud of saṃsāra.

original: nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: One becomes like the sun,

original: sems can thams cad snang bar byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad snang bar byed do //
translated: illuminating all beings.

original: zla ba lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: zla ba lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: They will be like the moon.

original: sems can thams @69b cad rab tu sim par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams @69b cad rab tu sim par byed do //
translated: They will bring satisfaction to all sentient beings.

original: nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: They will be like the sky.

original: ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so //
analyzed: ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so //
translated: They will not be sullied by any of the sufferings of the lower realms.

original: sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: They will be like the earth.🔽They will not be high or low.

original: mtho dman med do; ;lhun po lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: mtho dman med do; ;lhun po lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: They will be like Mount Meru.

original: sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so //
translated: They will not be able to be shaken by any sentient being.

original: thar pa lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: thar pa lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: They will be like liberation.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so //
translated: They will not be sullied by happiness or suffering.

original: de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te /🔽nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te / nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste /
translated: They will attain immeasurable and countless thousands of such qualities.

original: de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever they wish for, whatever they aspire to, whatever they hope for, will be accomplished simply by listening to, holding, reading, reciting, teaching, and repeating this dhāraṇī.🔽“

original: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang /
analyzed: bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang /
translated: By merely reciting it, one will be protected from excessive rain, drought,🔽hostile disturbances, human illness, bad dreams, misfortune,🔽times of fear, death,

original: chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g-yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed pa /
analyzed: chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g-yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed pa /
translated: thieves, the unprotected, battle, wild animals, and the suffering of famine.

original: bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain all happiness, prosperity, desires, and delights.

original: de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang / @70a *//
analyzed: de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang / @70a *//
translated: Then the entire assembly exclaimed, “Ha ha!”

original: ga zha bton te sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par
analyzed: ga zha bton te sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par
translated: Then, with a long Ah! he shook his various garments and ornaments, and with his heart he prostrated to all the bodhisattvas. He spoke the ocean-like praise of the one hundred and eight names of the noble Akashagarbha, the one who has power over all bodhisattvas:

original: brjod pa / nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog /
analyzed: brjod pa / nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog /
translated: The praise: Akashagarbha, supreme being of the three existences,

original: 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'//
analyzed: 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'//
translated: Possessor of the ocean of precious wealth and intelligence,

original: sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /
analyzed: sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /
translated: Pure being, supreme jewel of the unsurpassed,

original: thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
analyzed: thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
translated: Seed of liberation, dispeller of the suffering of samsara,

original: kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen //
analyzed: kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen //
translated: Knower of omniscience, knower of what is right and wrong,

original: thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen //
analyzed: thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen //
translated: Knower of liberation, knower of phenomena, knower of happiness and unhappiness,

original: lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen //
analyzed: lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen //
translated: Knower of the path, knower of what is cherished, knower of virtue and non-virtue,

original: dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang / stobs min mkhyen //
analyzed: dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang / stobs min mkhyen //
translated: Knower of time, knower of virtue, knower of strength and weakness,

original: 'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog /
analyzed: 'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog /
translated: Supreme being, supreme Dharma, supreme quality of beings,

original: lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /
analyzed: lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /
translated: The supreme path, the supreme mantra, the supreme way and the not way,

original: rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog /
analyzed: rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog /
translated: The supreme ornament, the supreme Dharma, the supreme holder and non-holder,

original: dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog /
analyzed: dag mchog rtogs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog /
translated: The supreme purity, the supreme realization, the supreme supreme and the not supreme,

original: zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab //
analyzed: zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab //
translated: The supreme peace, the supreme compassion, the supreme retinue,

original: 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab //
analyzed: 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab //
translated: The supreme light, the supreme liberation, the supreme support,

original: rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab //
analyzed: rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab //
translated: The supreme seal, the supreme mantra, the supreme compassion,

original: mnyam rab sems @70b can rab ste gsum rig rab //
analyzed: mnyam rab sems @70b can rab ste gsum rig rab //
translated: The supreme equality, the supreme being, the supreme knower of the three,

original: legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron //
analyzed: legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron //
translated: The supreme lamp of goodness, the supreme lamp of light, the lamp of strength and weakness,

original: thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron //
analyzed: thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron //
translated: The lamp of liberation, the lamp of lineage, the lamp of the victorious and the not victorious,

original: dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron //
analyzed: dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron //
translated: The lamp of virtue, the lamp of splendor, the lamp of the light of jewels,

original: rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron //
analyzed: rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron //
translated: The lamp that arises from the ornament of the moon in the sky,

original: mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od //
analyzed: mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od //
translated: The supreme light, the light of the rays of all good qualities,

original: legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od //
analyzed: legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od //
translated: The good light, the light of the support of the palace of liberation,

original: 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od //
analyzed: 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od //
translated: The great light, the light that illuminates ignorance,

original: rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba //
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba //
translated: The blazing vajra light, the light that holds bliss,

original: rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang //
translated: Vajra-indra, indra of beings, indra of the mind,

original: rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po //
analyzed: rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po //
translated: Indra of the mandala ornament of precious light,

original: rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang //
analyzed: rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang //
translated: Indra of the victor’s power, indra of the endless stream,

original: dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang //
analyzed: dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang //
translated: Indra of the hero, vidyādhara, indra of the three existences,

original: rdo rje bzang po rngo 'od rdo rje 'bar //
analyzed: rdo rje bzang po rngo 'od rdo rje 'bar //
translated: Vajra-bhadra, vajra of light, blazing vajra,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan //🔽rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan // rdo rje 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag /
translated: Vajrasattva, adorned with blazing vajras,🔽Vajra-light, vajra-holder, fierce vajra,

original: rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang //
analyzed: rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang //
translated: Vajra-magnificent, supreme vajra indra,

original: na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo //
analyzed: na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo //
translated: Blue-robed, with a blue bodily appearance,

original: sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan //
analyzed: sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan //
translated: Blue-colored, adorned with blue light,

original: ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams //
analyzed: ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams //
translated: Holding a sharp blue sword, firm,

original: mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs //
analyzed: mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs //
translated: Residing in the blazing blue sky palace,🔽Divine face, stainless, blazing intensely,

original: lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar; ;rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur //
analyzed: lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar; ;rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur //
translated: Very fierce, radiating light rays,

original: sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrul byed phreng mchog can //
analyzed: sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrul byed phreng mchog can //
translated: Removing evil, swirling like dust, supreme garland,

original: klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan //
analyzed: klog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan //
translated: The power of reading, the power of appearance, the power of beauty, the power of stability,

original: ral gri @71a *//🔽mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon //🔽rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs //🔽'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul //🔽gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa //
analyzed: ral gri @71a *// mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon // rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs // 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul // gsal zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa //
translated: The power of the sword,

original: cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren //
analyzed: cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren //
translated: He is the one who leads the great splendor of the excellent appearance.

original: byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye rgu 'dren //
analyzed: byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye rgu 'dren //
translated: He is the one who leads with love, the one who leads with the sun, the one who leads beings.

original: legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can //
analyzed: legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can //
translated: He is the excellent leader, the one who leads with the strength of the field, the compassionate one.

original: dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar //
analyzed: dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar //
translated: He is the one with the stainless appearance, the one with the blazing appearance.

original: rnam grangs sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can //
analyzed: rnam grangs sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can //
translated: He is the one with the banner of fame through the enumeration of the beautiful ones.

original: 'gro ba'i skyabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i skyabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen //
translated: He is the one who discerns the refuge of beings, the one who knows entering and turning back.

original: longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /
analyzed: longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /
translated: He is the one who engages with the mind that clearly shows enjoyment.

original: sku dmar sku mthon sku @71b mdzes sku bzang ba //
analyzed: sku dmar sku mthon sku @71b mdzes sku bzang ba //
translated: He is the red-bodied one, the tall-bodied one, the beautiful-bodied one, the well-formed-bodied one.

original: sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku //
analyzed: sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku //
translated: He is the yellow-bodied one, the white-bodied one, the one with the great splendor.

original: sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku //
analyzed: sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku //
translated: He is the one with the playful body, the one with the vajra body, the one with the excellent eyes.

original: rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams //
analyzed: rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams //
translated: He is the one with the family body, the one who holds the knowledge mantra, the one who holds the jewel.

original: gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog /
analyzed: gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog /
translated: He is the one with the crown jewel, the one with the crown, the one with the supreme crown.

original: cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /
analyzed: cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /
translated: He is the one with the crown, the one who holds the supreme vajra of the Dharma.

original: dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /
analyzed: dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /
translated: He is the one who holds the supreme jewel, the one who holds the excellent jewel.

original: sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs //
translated: He is the one who holds the four mudras, the one who is perfect.

original: rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu //
analyzed: rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu //
translated: He is very beautiful, moving and traveling in the sky.

original: srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'//
analyzed: srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'//
translated: He is the sun of the three worlds, possessing a thousand lights.🔽Rising on the mountain peak, he is clear, good, and auspicious,

original: ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa; ;yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags //
analyzed: ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa; ;yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags //
translated: His qualities, powers, and strengths are especially renowned.

original: nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od //
analyzed: nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od //
translated: He is the great jewel, the beautiful jewel, the light of the jewel,

original: nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar //
analyzed: nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar //
translated: The sun jewel, the jewel of conduct, the blazing jewel,

original: yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu //
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel, the sole protector of all beings.

original: nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba //
translated: A single jewel appears in the midst of space.

original: sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags //
analyzed: sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags //
translated: Beings are pure, vast, and renowned.

original: srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog /
analyzed: srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog /
translated: The sole protector of the three worlds, the supreme son of the Victorious Ones,

original: zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /
analyzed: zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /
translated: Peaceful, very peaceful, always worthy of refuge,

original: skye rgu'i bdag po pad 'byung padma skyes //
analyzed: skye rgu'i bdag po pad 'byung padma skyes //
translated: The lord of beings, born from a lotus, born from a lotus.

original: kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba //
analyzed: kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba //
translated: He is the one with the good light all around, possessing the Dharma of good explanations,

original: dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyad //
analyzed: dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyad //
translated: The one with the good explanations of prosperity, the well-tamed, the well-penetrating explanations,

original: blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang //
analyzed: blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang //
translated: The one with the good mind, the good light, the one with the good birth of bliss,

original: mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan //
analyzed: mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan //
translated: The one with the good wisdom, the good peace, possessing the supreme Dharma.

original: zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba @72a *//
analyzed: zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba @72a *//
translated: You are the source of peace, the king of lotuses,

original: 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: the source of bliss,

original: 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad //
analyzed: 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad //
translated: the source of light, the one who brings happiness,

original: legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa //
analyzed: legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa //
translated: the source of goodness, the source of wisdom, the one who generates strength,

original: snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad //
analyzed: snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grangs mdzad //
translated: the source of compassion, the one with a good mind, the one with many names,

original: rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo //
analyzed: rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo //
translated: the one with a liberated mind, the one with a mind of complete liberation,🔽the one with a mind of perfect liberation,

original: blo yangs par ni bkram zhing rnam par grags //
analyzed: blo yangs par ni bkram zhing rnam par grags //
translated: the one with a mind that is vast and renowned,

original: kun tu longs spyod sgo ste bla yi mchog /
analyzed: kun tu longs spyod sgo ste bla yi mchog /
translated: the one who enjoys all, the one with the door to the supreme,

original: blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs //
analyzed: blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs //
translated: the one with a stable mind, the one who is accomplished in the Three Jewels,

original: sangs rgyas padma mda' rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal //
analyzed: sangs rgyas padma mda' rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal //
translated: the one with a face like a blooming lotus,

original: dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad //🔽snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul //
analyzed: dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad // snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul //
translated: the one with pure eyes, the one with a pleasing appearance,🔽the one with a stable and disciplined essence,

original: ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba //
translated: the one who has attained the continuity of the essence, the one who is very clear,

original: spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa //
analyzed: spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa //
translated: the one with eyes that are well-focused like well-trained arrows,

original: 'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra //
analyzed: 'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra //
translated: the one with a fearless face like the autumn moon,🔽the one with a face like the autumn moon,

original: mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs //
analyzed: mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs //
translated: And a hundred spears, the best of weapons, complete.

original: drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes //
analyzed: drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes //
translated: Born from the three fierce, frightening, sin-removing ones,

original: rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sla //
analyzed: rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sla //
translated: Well-tamed, skilled, friendly, easy to associate with,

original: rab tu drag ba gnyen rab gser mdog can //
analyzed: rab tu drag ba gnyen rab gser mdog can //
translated: Very fierce, with close relatives, the one with a golden complexion,

original: lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams //
translated: The great god Śiva, holding a stake in his hand,🔽With three eyes, possessing the three knowledges, dispelling the three fires,

original: spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel; ;'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'//
analyzed: spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel; ;'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'//
translated: With good light, holding a flower weapon, possessing a flower,

original: na bza' bzang mnabs  g-yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen //🔽legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna @72b tshogs mnga'//
analyzed: na bza' bzang mnabs  g-yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen // legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna @72b tshogs mnga'//
translated: Wearing good clothes, with a great right-hand gesture,🔽Well-drawn, possessing various weapons,

original: na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal //
analyzed: na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal //
translated: Wearing various clothes, glorious with various ornaments,

original: zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra //
analyzed: zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra //
translated: With a face like the full moon,

original: zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad //🔽bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'//
analyzed: zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad // bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'//
translated: Illuminating the entire world with the radiance of his face,🔽With a smile, the sun's rays shining brightly,

original: zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba //
analyzed: zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba //
translated: Illuminating the ocean with the radiance of his face,

original: dbang chen rdo rje'i thog legs 'jigs pa'i sgra //
analyzed: dbang chen rdo rje'i thog legs 'jigs pa'i sgra //
translated: With the great vajra thunderbolt, making a frightening sound,

original: rdo rje drag po nor bu g-yo ba 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje drag po nor bu g-yo ba 'dzin //
translated: Vajra Wrath, holding a moving jewel,

original: sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan //
analyzed: sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan //
translated: Powerful one who illuminates with beautiful sounds,

original: blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog /
analyzed: blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog /
translated: Great Intellect, supreme ear of intellect,

original: rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan //
analyzed: rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan //
translated: Holding ornaments, holding glory, having a face of jewels,

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas //
translated: The abode of all migrating beings, moving and unmoving,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang //
translated: The protector Tathagata, the garland of good sons,

original: stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid //
translated: Great strength, essence of worldly intellect,

original: skye rgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags //
analyzed: skye rgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags //
translated: Lord of beings, equal and examined command,

original: mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu //
translated: Lord of men, cause of producing heaven,

original: sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can //
analyzed: sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can //
translated: Like an illusion, with the arrow of desire and vajra,

original: mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan //
analyzed: mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan //
translated: Having power and strength, with beautiful and lovely eyes,

original: ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs //
analyzed: ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs //
translated: Good teacher, bridge of the path of emptiness,

original: gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug par mdzad //
analyzed: gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug par mdzad //
translated: Engaged in the cause of increasing the three dear ones,

original: brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa //
analyzed: brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa //
translated: The steadfast one, thoroughly ascertained in the cause,

original: dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags //
translated: The master of all sacred maṇḍalas,

original: gcig pu skye rgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen //
analyzed: gcig pu skye rgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen //
translated: He is the sole knower of the ritual of the mandala of beings.

original: rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes //
translated: He is born in the realm of Vairocana.

original: dbang bskur @73a *//
analyzed: dbang bskur @73a *//
translated: He has received consecration

original: brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas //
analyzed: brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas //
translated: and is well-established in the ten stages.

original: gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags //
analyzed: gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags //
translated: He has reached the great stage and is the sole supreme one.

original: skye rgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas //
analyzed: skye rgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas //
translated: Having heard this praise of one hundred and eight names, which removes the afflictions of beings and destroys evil,🔽who would not recite it,

original: bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa //
analyzed: bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa //
translated: the supreme son of the Sugata,

original: 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang //🔽nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi //
analyzed: 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang // nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi //
translated: shining like the single moon in the world?🔽Even if one were to praise the one with the essence of space,

original: mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod yang //
analyzed: mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod yang //
translated: the one who sits in front of a single being,

original: de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing //
translated: he would become the supreme being in the three existences

original: dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur //
analyzed: dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur //
translated: and would be liberated from all abodes of impurity.🔽In battles, disputes, and terrible famines,

original: g-yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na //
analyzed: g-yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na //
translated: and when epidemics occur,

original: mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad skyes nas //
analyzed: mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad skyes nas //
translated: what wise person, having arisen in faith,🔽would not recite this praise?

original: nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa //
translated: And the one who praises Ākāśagarbha.🔽He is freed from all sources of fear,🔽From evil that leads to suffering,🔽And he will certainly attain the supreme peace, the supreme bliss, the abode of all,

original: de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol; ;des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang // bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol; ;des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang // bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur //
translated: And the vast happiness.

original: bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am //
analyzed: bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'am //
translated: If one recites this for the sake of attaining happiness,🔽For the sake of increasing wealth,🔽For the sake of attaining a kingdom, beauty, or wealth,

original: rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang // rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang // rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir //
translated: Or for the sake of attaining the basis of all good qualities,

original: bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt that it will be accomplished.

original: de phyir ci ste rtag tu @73b 'dod bde kun //
analyzed: de phyir ci ste rtag tu @73b 'dod bde kun //
translated: Therefore, if one desires all kinds of happiness,

original: 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba //🔽nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la //
analyzed: 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba // nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la //
translated: If one desires the sole hero of all beings,

original: rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi //
analyzed: rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang brtan par bgyi //
translated: One should always be steadfast and recite the mantra🔽Of Ākāśagarbha, the protector of the three worlds.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The name-chapter of the noble Ākāśagarbha, with dhāraṇī and mantra, is complete.
